reviews.review_msg: Okaish prof. Rejects Graham Hancock's theory of history and Archeology.

He is one of the nicest instructors I've had and although I took his course as an elective and I'm not a big fan of archaeology, I enjoyed his classes a lot. His exams are mostly based on the class lectures, just a lot of memorization. Try to participate as much as you can and be sure to review his slides and class notes before the exams.
The best prof I have ever seen before

Class is easy however, make sure you study the slides a LOT. Exams are lot easier compared to the lecture slides. Study each lecture in detail couple of times nd become familiar with the key concepts. It is a straight forward class as long as u study in detail. NOT A EASY CLASS compared to other GPA booster classes u gotta work for the grade.

he is a nice person.many people told me ARCH is an easy A but found out that this one of the worst class I ever take. so boring, so much to remeber, each lectures almost60-70 slides. you have to remebre all the useless information.If you are not welling to read too much and remebre stuff then don't take this class,I wish someone told me that before
